metadata.name: Embrace
metadata.description:
"Embrace" is part of Benedicto Cernal III poster everyday series that is inspired by brutalism & anti-design. This composition explores blissful approach of analogue textures, typographic play & monochromatic harmony.

Perfection is boring & overrated, posters can also be visually interesting by bending the principles of color, contrast, balance, perspective, etc.

There's a subtle but powerful gesture about being a rebel underlying this idea:

Imperfect but authentic.
